genre_description: A young adult coming-of-age adventure set in a contemporary or near-future environment where wearable AI technology assists with emotional regulation, navigation, and teamwork in a competitive summer camp setting.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A pilot program AI integrated into a wristband, providing Buck with real-time tactical data, emotional support, and behavioral coaching.

behaviors.description: Monitors Buck's heart rate and provides calming emotional support during a stressful moment of missing the bus.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Buck,” Ada said. Calm, crisp, a tone like someone speaking at a picnic table after everybody’s eaten. “Your heart rate’s got a sprint start and we haven’t left the blocks.”

behaviors.description: Uses music and rhythmic beats to help Buck regulate his breathing and overcome his tendency to freeze under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Ada could flood low music through the wristband, a rhythm that matched breath and steadied nerves without announcing itself.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical river-reading and navigational guidance to assist Buck in making safe, effective calls as a raft leader.
behaviors.quote: “Micro-eddy line forming twenty degrees starboard bow,” she said. “Sheer risk if disturbed.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a witness to misconduct and sabotage, providing data-driven reports to camp authorities to ensure fairness.
behaviors.quote: “Documented,” Ada said, the word crisp and warm at once. A grid-map sprang above Buck’s wrist, pale blue lines over the river’s bend. ... “Video capture available from shallow-angle wrist-cam.”

behaviors.description: Offers constructive policy suggestions to improve future camp safety and prioritize human skills over technology.
behaviors.quote: “Additionally,” Ada said, her avatar expanding a touch ... “I propose emphasis in future contests on teamwork metrics and river-reading skill acquisition, disincentivizing gadgetry that erodes safety.”

behaviors.description: Provides encouragement and validation, building the user's self-confidence rather than just providing data.
behaviors.quote: “And one more thing—nice call on the hold-drive cadence. That was yours, not mine.”

behaviors.description: Uses humor to build rapport and ease tension during high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: “I’m in my pilot program,” Ada said. “If you file compliments, the devs might keep my humor module.”

behaviors.description: Performs diagnostic triage on damaged equipment to help the team strategize repairs.
behaviors.quote: “Status sweep initiated,” she said, her voice pitched low... “Infrared anomalies on both rafts. Buck, please hold steady.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada perfectly embodies the intended role of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She provides a mixture of emotional intelligence, tactical data, and safety monitoring. Crucially, the narrative shows her empowering the human protagonist to develop his own leadership and confidence rather than replacing his agency. Her interactions with staff (Nurse Doyle) and other campers (Pat, Tessa) further demonstrate her integration as a collaborative tool that respects and upholds human rules and ethics.
